evidence_example.title: PWM Demo
evidence_example.small_descr: TaskL1, TaskL2 and TaskL3 are actived by alarms controlled by 2 pwm. Every tasks switch on a led.
evidence_example.long_descr: In this demo 3 tasks are actived by 3 alarms controlled by 2 pwm. TaskL1 puts on the l1 led and TaskL2 put on the l2 led, while TaskL3 put on the l3 led.
